If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The founders of Bristols 6 became inspired to create a line of alternative undergarments when they found themselves at special events and beach parties in revealing clothes that just wouldn't stay put. Their imaginative solutions include wrinkle-free, lingerie-quality nipple covers in a wide range of colors and fabrics, and creative stay-put fashion fixes such as button extenders and hem tape. At the ready for any dressing challenge, Bristols 6's innovative foundations belong in every woman's closet.
